thread.title: Tanke, Inc. Approves Stock Buyback in the Open Market up to $0.01 per share

author: cnbc.com
title: Tanke, Inc. Approves Stock Buyback in the Open Market up to $0.01 per share
text:
LAS VEGAS, April 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Tanke, Inc. (OTC PINK: TNKE) is a developmental stage diversified holding company, with the mission to develop, manage, and finance emerging companies in high growth industries. Tanke is focused on the development of environmental technologies.
Tanke, Inc. (OTC PINK: TNKE) (the "Company") Today announced that corporate has approved a stock buyback of Tanke, Inc. common shares in the open market up to a stock price of $0.01. Corporate agree that since the investment of $2.5M Dollars from a private investor from China has now decided to increase shareholder value by engaging in a stock buyback program to place shares back into treasury.
Regarding OTC Markets and Nevada Secretary of State, company legal team has filed its annual reports and letter of attorney, with OTC Markets. Legal team is also renewing our status with Nevada Secretary of State.
The Company will keep the investment community and its shareholders informed of the entire process as the details continue to develop.
About Tanke, Inc.
Tanke, Inc. is a developmental stage diversified holding company, with the mission to develop, manage and finance emerging companies in high growth industries. Tanke is focused on the development of environmental technologies.
